title: La scienza in cucina e l’arte di mangiar bene
author: Pellegrino Artusi

title: Le Guide Culinaire
author: Auguste Escoffier
notes: Codified French haute cuisine as professional standard

title: A Book of Mediterranean Food
author: Elizabeth David
notes: Opened British eyes to Mediterranean food postwar

title: French Provincial Cooking
author: Elizabeth David
notes: Cemented her as Britain’s culinary prose authority

title: Mastering the Art of French Cooking
author: Julia Child, Simone Beck & Louisette Bertholle
notes: Made French cuisine approachable; huge bestseller

title: Il talismano della felicità
author: Ada Boni
notes: Defining compendium for Italian home cooks

title: Chinese Cookery
author: Ken Hom
notes: Introduced authentic Chinese food via BBC tie-in

title: The Silver Palate Cookbook
author: Rosso & Lukins
notes: Trendy but foundational for dinner parties

title: The Art of Cookery Made Plain and Easy
author: Hannah Glasse
notes: Dominated Anglophone market, plain English canon

title: Ons Kookboek
author: KVLV
notes: Culinary bible of Flanders; wedding gift tradition

title: Kotiruoka: Keittokirja kotia ja koulua varten
author: Reinilä, Calonius & Krank

title: The Book of Tasty and Healthy Food
author: Institute of Nutrition (USSR)

title: Edmonds Cookery Book
author: NZ Women’s Division of Federated Farmers

title: The Margaret Fulton Cookbook
author: Margaret Fulton
notes: Taught generations of Australians modern cookery

title: A Book of Middle Eastern Food
author: Claudia Roden

title: An Invitation to Indian Cooking
author: Madhur Jaffrey
notes: Introduced Indian cooking to Anglo-American kitchens
